review: It was easy to set up, I was up and searching almost immediately. However, I had a couple of problems. Searching for Poirot was a problem. I tried "Poaraw" and it gave me "porno" as solution. I tried "Poarawt", and I got stuff starting with M only. I even tried "Poyrawtt" without working. I eventually gave up and searched for Agatha Christie, which I find immediately. I have done some other searches, and they worked fine.Picture and sound quality is good. I have had no problems streaming things from my view list. I've only had it for 3 days, but so far it's exactly what I expected.
